hooks.command: INPUT=$(cat -) && LAST_MSG=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.last_assistant_message // "Task completed"' | head -c 200) && curl -sf -X POST http://localhost:23000/api/notify -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d "{\"title\":\"$(basename "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR")\",\"message\":\"${LAST_MSG}\"}"
